content.raw:
I made some modifications on branch [sdformat_issue45_scpeters](#!/osrf/sdformat/commits/branch/sdformat_issue45_scpeters) that merge with a more recent sdf_2.0 branch and create material.sdf that is used by visual.sdf and road.sdf.

Please consider pulling this into your fork:
~~~
hg pull #!/osrf/sdformat -b sdformat_issue45_scpeters
~~~
content.html:
I made some modifications on branch sdformat_issue45_scpeters that merge with a more recent sdf_2.0 branch and create material.sdf that is used by visual.sdf and road.sdf.

Please consider pulling this into your fork:

hg pull #!/osrf/sdformat -b sdformat_issue45_scpeters
